page.title: 09BEESTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: The newest building in the{Beeston {Rylands}area is the{New Rylands Junior {School,}which was officially opened on 18th April 1985. The school is built around a courtyard,and is a replacement for an old wooden building. The school has lots of modern devices.The heating,the lighting and the burglar alarm are all controlled automatically by computers. There are four pairs of open plan classrooms,each with quiet rooms and a practical area for messy work.There are two libraries,and an audio-visual room for watching television and music. The children like the new building very much.
